item.title: Mining execs embrace 'phenomenal' rare earths interest from the Middle East
item.description: Mining executives have welcomed bumper investor interest in critical minerals from the Middle East.

item.title: Trump Treasury Sec. Bessent says he's felt 'pain' from China because he's a 'soybean farmer'
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent's estimated hundreds and millions of dollars in wealth includes soybean and corn farmland in North Dakota.

item.title: Largest federal worker union urges end to government shutdown
item.description: Democrats oppose the Republican resolution to end the shutdown because they want any measure to extend enhanced Affordable Care Act tax credits.

item.title: Trump confirms recent MRI but declines to give reason why
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday he had undergone an MRI examination, without saying why.

item.title: Rare earth stocks extend losses as U.S. expects China to delay export controls
item.description: Shares of U.S.-listed rare earth miners fell sharply on Monday as U.S. officials expect China to delay introducing export controls on critical mineral...
